ack.p: We acknowledge support received from the National Influenza Center and Noguchi Memorial Institute of Medical Research, and Afrique One Alliance. In addition, we would like to thank the physicians, nurses, surveillance officers, laboratory scientists and health information officers who contribute to the Influenza-like illnesses sentinel surveillance system in the Greater Accra region of Ghana, as well as the staff and Cohort 11 residents of the Ghana Field Epidemiology and Laboratory Program.
